results.name: a(n) is -1, 0, or +1 such that a(n) == A156552(n) (mod 3).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
formula: If A329903(n) = 2, then a(n) = -1, otherwise a(n) = A329903(n).
xref: Cf. A329609, A329604, A332812 for positions of 0's, +1's and -1's in this sequence.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 01 2020
